name: Don't Screw It Up
description:
From:

To: Employee no. 54679

Dear ,

Hello! You've been hired as an entry level Gas Cap Laborer at the Fjörd Automotive Company. Your one-and-only job is to fasten a gas cap to each car that comes down the conveyor belt. But there might just be some room for growth in the future if you work hard enough.

You can left click on an empty slot to place a screw. Each screw needs 3 more clicks to fully secure them. All empty slots must have a fully secured screw before you can send the car down the line. 

At any time you are able to click on the employee handbook to pause the game, view controls, and access the main menu.

There is a quota of cars to complete before your shift ends. Here at FAC, we don't take kindly to stragglers. Failure to meet your quota will result in immediate termination.

Don't screw it up!
